[Mission] 0 : Look at the top X cards of your Deck and return them in any order. Then, you can remove a coin on this Mission to draw 1 card. X = the number of coins on this Mission.

name: Summoning: Gedo Statue
effect:
As an additional cost to play this card, remove 9 "Tailed Beast" Ninja cards in your Discard Pile from the game.
Requirements: Tobi + Entrance cost of 6 or more or Masked Man
Effect: Place a Gedo Statue coin in the user's Team in any position with the following: "[Power: 20/20 (Healthy and Injured)] ["When this Ninja wins an Outstanding Victory, move every Ninja opposing this Ninja to your Battle Reward area, face down. "]

name: Summoning: Reanimation
effect:
Requirements: Kabuto Yakushi + Entrance cost of 6 or more
Effect: Choose up to 3 [IMPURE RESURRECTION] Ninja cards in your Discard Pile. Move 1 of the chosen Ninja cards to the user's Team in any position, ignoring Sacrifice, then move the other 2 to your hand.
"First we have…"

name: Super Sized!
effect:
Permanent (2)
Effect: Your Ninjas get +1/+1 and +1 Entrance cost.
Effect: At the end of your turn, you can flip a coin. If heads, place a coin on this Mission.

name: Tailed Beast Bomb
effect:
Requirements: Naruto Uzumaki (9 Tails Cloak) or "Tailed Beast"
Effect: Discard 1 Ninja or Mission OR negate and discard 1 Jutsu.
Password: NQNUEMHA9L

name: Tailed Beast Transformation
effect:
Target: 1 "Jinchuriki" Ninja you control
Effect: Move the target to your hand, then search your Deck for a Ninja card with the same name as the target and move it to your Village. Shuffle your Deck afterwards.

name: Temari
effect:
Sand | Jonin | Female | Mental Power: 3
[GALE FORCE]
When this Ninja is deployed, your opponent reveals their hand. You can remove 1 non-Permanent Mission card revealed this way from the game and discard 1 Wind card from your hand. In that case, apply that Mission card's effect.
"What's going on?"

name: Tenten
effect:
Leaf | Chunin | Female | Mental Power: 2
[RECOVERY]
Revitalize
When this Ninja is deployed, you may discard 1 Earth card from your hand. In that case, move 1 Permanent Mission card from your Chakra area to your hand.
"More reinforcements!"

Stone | Satoosa | Male | Mental Power: 2 | Name: Mú

Sacrifice: 1 Ninja
This Ninja cannot be blocked by a Team that includes a Ninja with less Entrance cost than this Ninja's.
"I commend you, whoever you are…"

effect:
Cloud | Satoosa | Male
[IMPURE RESURRECTION]
Sacrifice: 1 Ninja
Valid: This Ninja cannot receive Damage or be removed from play due to Damage.
Valid: When a Jutsu this Ninja is using is negated, if this Ninja is injured, discard it. Otherwise, injure this Ninja.
"I would have enjoyed battle with all of you."

name: The 3rd Tsuchikage
effect:
Stone | Satoosa | Male | Name: Onoki
[BOTH SCALES]
Revitalize
[Valid | Mission] Remove 1 coin from a Mission you control: Place a -1/-1 coin on target Ninja, then remove that Ninja from its Team.
"I'll go!!"

effect:
Cloud | Satoosa | Male | Name: A

When this Ninja is put in play, you can injure 1 Ninja whose Combat is less than this Ninja's.
"Have some respect!"

name: The 5th Kazekage
effect:
Sand | Satoosa | Male | Name: Gaara of the Desert

If you control another "Sand" Ninja, this Ninja gets +1/+0 and the cost of Jutsu cards used by this Ninja is reduced by Wind. The same is true for "Leaf", "Cloud", "Stone", and "Mist".
"You didn't need to get up."

name: The 5th Mizukage
effect:
Mist | Satoosa | Female | Name: Mei Terumi
[CONTROLLED MIST]
At the start of your opponent's turn, if they control more Ninjas than you, they discard 1 Ninja they control.
"Have them hurry, too!"

While your opponent has 8 or more Chakra, this Ninja card gets -6 Entrance cost.
When this Ninja is put in play except by deployment, discard your opponent's Chakra.

name: Tobi
effect:
Rogue Ninja | Male | Mental Power: 3 | Rinnegan | Sharingan Eye

Desperation
[EOJ] Give your opponent 1 Battle Reward: Remove target Ninja from the game. At the end of this turn, put that Ninja back into play, then injure it.
"Then hurry up and do it."
